price: (Nkͻmhyεni), Ka sε: “Honhom kronkron (Ɔbͻfoͻ Gabriel) de Nokorε no na ɛsane firi wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ, sεdeε εbεma wͻn a wͻagye adie no agyina pintinn, na ayε kwankyerε ne anigyesεm ama Muslimifoͻ no.
arabic: قُلۡ نَزَّلَهُۥ رُوحُ ٱلۡقُدُسِ مِن رَّبِّكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُثَبِّتَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهُدٗى وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul nazzalahu rūḥu al-qudusi min rabbika bil-ḥaqi liyuthabbita alladhīna āmanū wahudan wabush'rā lil'mus'limīna
